TopicTitle: My first shuttle and my first rendevous!

Articles.Content:
Gather round children, for I have a tale for you!

'Tis the tale of my first Shuttle, Rendezvous, and flying of something plane-like!

Sorry that I don't have pictures on the pad, I never intended to do this until the rendezvous, and it seems I have not saved the craft. I will rebuild it and maybe attach it to this post.

ANYWAY!

Here, take the album (Warning - LOTS OF PHOTOS): http://imgur.com/a/4nRCc#0

Not a bad rendevous

Did you use plugins or was it all manual?

Not a bad rendevous

Did you use plugins or was it all manual?

All manual I seem to have suddenly gone from uncapable of rendezvous, to being able to perform a really good one, I have a couple of spaceships in perfect orbits, about 10 ft away from eachother, not moving on time warp, haha!

My only gripe is that the craft will rotate when not in use. It'd be nice if it remembered SAS was on, even if it just meant putting it's direction on rails.
All manual is the fun way of doing it. Well done on your orbital rendezvous.
Haha brilliant pics! Please tell me you switched each other's rocket they were controlling

Haha brilliant pics! Please tell me you switched each other's rocket they were controlling

Yeah, I did! Bob got a lucky break there - Bill 'took the fall' as it were.
